reviewText: Ok, but only for very beginners, not for advanced

Truly Hawaiian style.  He is laid-back, which lowers my beginner anxiety.  His confidence and poise which probable reflects his years of experience and competition, helps me know that I can reach the goal of being comfortable and competent at my level.  He makes it look like fun, the mark of a great teacher.

I was looking for an instructional video that would show me in detail the correct paddling technique. Thinking that if I paid for an instructional video it would offer more instruction than what is freely available on the internet. I was wrong,
I felt this was a bit dissapointing, for such a bold title of mastering technique it really didn't serve that purpose well at all. A lot of points weren't covered.

Was disappointed with the lack of content.  This guys is a world class paddler and doesn't do much beyond the basics.  There are some many paddle combinations you would expect a guy at this level to put in a $30 video.  A lot of the video is him standing on land talking with a paddle in his hand, some old clips thrown in and some new stuff.  Worth maybe $10-15 but definately not $29.
Danny is a champion paddler and goes over proper technique in the video. Also covers some important parts of wave riding technique. Excellent video worth the cost of admission.
I couldn't wait to get this video. It's very easy to understand. I'll be practicing these tips on the water asap!
